After I shared my unfortunate conversation with King Sage Cat, Do Gong told me that was to be expected. I guess I won't be able to obtain the Antidote Marble with the Sage Cat by negotiation. There's no other way now... I'll have to take it by force. I'll have to eliminate the #rKing Sage Cat#k and obtain the #bAntidote Marble#k!

After defeating the King Sage Cat, I grabbed the Antidote Marble and gave it to Do Gong. Fortunately, the marble was legit, and Do Gong seems to have been cured from poisoning. I better make it a habit of not being so gullible against others with suspect motives.
커억... 해독약은 구해 오셨소...? 요괴선사에게 해독약을 받을 수 없었다고...? 당연한 것 아니겠소? 그렇게 쉽게 약을 줄 거면 독을 쓰지도 않았을 것이오... 쿨럭쿨럭!
이제 방법은 하나뿐이오. 요괴선사를 쓰러뜨리고 해독약을 가져 오는 것! ..당신의 힘이라면... 헉헉. 가능할 것이오... 그럼 부탁하오.

Hoh... Did you manage to find the antidote...? You weren't able to get one from King Sage Cat...? Isn't that obvious? If he was to give you the antidote that easily, then he wouldn't have poisoned me in the first place... Cough cough!
There's no other way now. You'll need to defeat #rKing Sage Cat#k and obtain the #bAntidote Marble#k! I truly believe...
Hmmph... (breathing heavily)... oh, you, you are back... were you able to...oh, so this is the... Antidote Marble...

...phew... Fortunately, the Antidote Marble is real. I have a feeling the King Sage Cat was using the Antidote Marble as a bait for something very sinister. Thank goodness his plan was foiled... hmmm? Why do you have that look on your face?

Don't feel sorry. I may have been poisoned, but I'm fully cured now. You were also able to defeat the King Sage Cat once and for all! Isn't that what we all hoped for? He was a thorn in Mu Lung's side for the longest time, but this should keep him quiet for a while now. Thank you so much!
Hmm...were you not able to obtain the Antidote Marble? You can acquire the #bAntidote Marble#k by defeating the #rKing Sage Cat#k.
